data.title: Kate Winslet and Sam Mendes split
data.meta_description: OSCAR-winning couple Kate Winslet and Sam Mendes have separated after almost seven years of marriage.
data.text:
OSCAR-winning couple Kate Winslet and Sam Mendes have separated after almost seven years of marriage.

"The split is entirely amicable and is by mutual agreement. Both parties are fully committed to the future joint parenting of their children," British law firm Schillings said.

Mendes won Best Director at the 2000 Academy Awards for American Beauty while Winslet took home Best Actress in 2009 for The Reader.

Winslet, 34, separated from Mendes at an unspecified point earlier this year, Schillings said.

It wasn't clear whether divorce proceedings have begun.

The pair have been married since 2003 and have two children.
